entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Memory leak with `System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Meter` when not disposed #114601
  • Unbounded memory leak from DependencyInjectionEventSource #114599

Closed

  • Failed to AOT compile aot-instances.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 134 #110003
    9.0.x
  • System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` produces invalid pdb #110096
    9.0.x
  • TCP FastOpen does not work in some Linux .NET binaries #110560
    9.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • `ProviderAliasAttribute` type name reference changed from plain string to type safe expression #114607
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • WIP: `ProviderAliasAttribute` moved to `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions` solution. #114606
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Undo a few JIT layout workarounds #114605
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Apply format patch in lsraarm64.cpp #114603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Don't allow retyping of casts containing a memory load #114602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use [UN]INSTALL_MANAGED_EXCEPTION_DISPATCHER_EX to backpatch CallDescrWorkerInternal SEH record on x86/funclets #114600
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Deref pointer in minipal/time #114598
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Mark InlineArrays as NonVersionable #114590
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Remove a few more instances of unsafe code in STJ #114490
    area-System.Text.Json, reduce-unsafe

Updated

  • missing opportunities in constant folding around bitwise ops #99136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support W3C Propagator #114583
    breaking-change, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 10.0.0
  • [S.T.J] Removed unused field in JsonProperty #114071
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • HybridCache: add net10 HybridCache zero-alloc fetch API #114427
    api-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [release/9.0][wasm][interpreter] Fix PackedSimd interpreter intrinsics #114218
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2686245 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Micro optimizations to improve the performance of EH stackwalking, particularly in the X86 with Funclets model #114582
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Allow TargetOS and TargetRid to be overridden in DotNetBuild.props #113765
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbb #114150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix IsVNConstantBound assert #114486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
